InstructionData.Title: deepMinerCentrifugeAutomate
InstructionData.Description: Opens all centrifuges when reagents <= 50, also turns on all centrifuges when program startsâ€‹
InstructionData.Author: Rizzard of Oz
InstructionData.Instructions:
alias currReagents r0
define allCentrifuges 690945935
start: sb allCentrifuges On 1 initialize: sb allCentrifuges ClearMemory 1
currentlyProcessingReagents: #loop until 50 reagents processed from dirty ore lb currReagents allCentrifuges Reagents Average bgeal currReagents 50 centrifugeDone sleep 1 j currentlyProcessingReagents
centrifugeDone: #open centrifuge sb allCentrifuges Open 1 centrifugeDoneEmptyingLoop: #loop until export count is 50, then wait for import count to be 50 lb currReagents allCentrifuges Reagents Average beq currReagents 0 centrifugeDoneImport sleep 1 j centrifugeDoneEmptyingLoop centrifugeDoneImport: sb allCentrifuges Open 0 j initialize
